意図は

trans-unit.source: This change fixes a bug in the earlier implementation that could cause errors in some situations. This situation will only arise if the userid and username for a user are not the same. If membrane is being used for content- based user objects, or if email-as-login is enabled and a user has changed their email address this will be the case. In the previous implementation the username parameter was implicitly being treated as userid. The new implementation does not do so. If consumer code is relying on this bug and passing userid, and if that code uses the username parameter as a keyword parameter, then lookup will fail. In all other cases, there should be no difference.
trans-unit.target: This change fixes a bug in the earlier implementation that could cause errors in some situations. This situation will only arise if the userid and username for a user are not the same. If membrane is being used for content- based user objects, or if email-as-login is enabled and a user has changed their email address this will be the case. In the previous implementation the username parameter was implicitly being treated as userid. The new implementation does not do so. If consumer code is relying on this bug and passing userid, and if that code uses the username parameter as a keyword parameter, then lookup will fail. In all other cases, there should be no difference.

trans-unit.source: plone.api.content.delete: add option check_linkintegrity. If True raise exception if deleting would result in broken links. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: plone.api.content.delete:check_linkintegrityオプションを追加しました。Trueの場合、削除するとリンク切れになる場合は例外を発生させます。[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: plone.api.content.find: object_provides arguments accepts tuples. Fixes #266. [ale-rt]
trans-unit.target: plone.api.content.find:object_providesの引数がタプルを受け付けるようになった。266を修正しました。[ale-rt]

trans-unit.source: plone.api.content.get_state now allows for an optional default value. This is used when no workflow is defined for the object. Refs #246 [jaroel]
trans-unit.target: plone.api.content.get_stateでは、オプションでデフォルト値を指定できるようになりました。これはオブジェクトに対してワークフローが定義されていない場合に使用されます。参照番号 #246 [jaroel]
plone.api.content.get_viewが例外を受け取らなくなった。[jaroel]

trans-unit.source: plone.api.portal.get_registry_record now suggests look-alike records when no records is found. Refs #249. [jaroel]
trans-unit.target: plone.api.portal.get_registry_record は、レコードが見つからなかった場合に似たようなレコードを提案するようになりました。参照番号 #249。[jaroel]
